channel.title: [PI] Verac Effect..?
channel.description:
I have made a new boss, Where would i go to add this npc to have the same effect as Verac ( Hit through prayer ) ? Because right now if you protect Melee then the boss always hits 0's
Thanks

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“lifezjoke, post:1, topic:394476”]I have made a new boss, Where would i go to add this npc to have the same effect as Verac ( Hit through prayer ) ?
Because right now if you protect Melee then the boss always hits 0’s

Thanks[/quote]look in either npchandler.java under the case or whatever for the verac npc id or in combatassistant.java would be one of those most likely.
